segments.text: Good morning , how have you been doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven ’ t been able to take a deep breath lately , and I need to know why .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you had any type of bug lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I ’ Ve been feeling fairly good most of the time . It just is hard to breathe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Has anyone ever told you that you have allergies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No one has ever checked me for allergies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does this happen more when you are under stress ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When the weather gets really cold , it gets worse .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am going to refer you to a pulmonary specialist who can run tests on you for asthma .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for pursuing this . I appreciate your help .
segments.speaker: S2
